Package org.im4java.script

Contains classes for script-generation

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ScriptGenerator This interface defines the methods for a ScriptGenerator.
 

Class Summary
AbstractScriptGenerator This class is an abstract implementation of a ScriptGenerator.
BashScriptGenerator This class implements a BashScriptGenerator.
CmdScriptGenerator This class implements a CmdScriptGenerator.

Contains classes for script-generation.
